SEARCH
Package edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.application

Class UserInputHandler

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.application.UserInputHandler
public class UserInputHandler extends Object
The UserInputHandler class handles input operations for the user. It provides methods to read strings, integers, and floats from the user.
Version:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • stringReader

      public String stringReader(String prompt)
      Reads a string input from the user.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The message to display to prompt the user before reading input.
      Returns:
      String input from the user.
      Since:
      0.0.1

    • intReader

      public int intReader(String prompt)
      Reads an integer input from the user. If the input is not a valid integer, it will re-prompt until there is a valid input.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The message to display to the user before reading input.
      Returns:
      Integer input from the user.
      Since:
      0.0.1

    • decimalReader

      public BigDecimal decimalReader(String prompt)
      Reads a decimal input from the user. If the input is not a valid decimal, it will re-prompt until the input is valid.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The message to display to the user before reading input.
      Returns:
      Decimal input from the user.
      Since:
      0.0.1

    • dateReader

      public String dateReader(String prompt)
      Reads the date input from user. Will re-prompt if user enters an invalid input. Refactored to be more versatile than regex, helped by CoPilot.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt message.
      Returns:
      Will return the inputted date of expiry.
      Since:
      0.0.1

    • unitReader

      public String unitReader(String prompt)
      Reads the unit of measurement input from user. Will re-prompt if user enters wrong unit format.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt message.
      Returns:
      Will return the inputted unit.
      Since:
      0.0.1
